title: Gold slips as upbeat US data boosts dollar, dims rate-cut bets
full_text: Gold slips as upbeat US data boosts dollar, dims rate-cut bets. By Ishaan Arora Jan 16 (Reuters) - Gold extended its losses on Friday after stronger-than-expected U.S. economic data dampened expectations of the U.S..
